page.title: 10The M3 and My Garden
page.content:
Before the houses were built the land used to be a part of{Windsor Great {Park,}and before the motorway, Tekels Way used to be part of Tekels Avenue, a well known local road.
The gardens used to be much smaller than their present \ acre, ending at the{motorway drainage ditch}that runs halfway down the gardens.
The land beyond the ditch belonged to the council and was up for sale. A gentleman wished to buy the land in order to build a hotel, but the house owners in Tekels Way at that time, got together and decided that they did not want that, so they purchased the land and extended all the gardens.
